synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO)3·6H2O (0.0298 g, 0.1 mmol), imidazole (0.136 g, 2.0 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered and washed twice with ethanol
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Colorless crystals of ZnIm were found embedded within an unidentified white powder and were removed by hand.

ambient_conditions.equipment: Oxford Diffraction Gemini diffractometer equipped with a CCD detector

high_pressure_conditions.data_collection: Oxford Diffraction Xcalibur instrument with monochromated Mo Kα radiation (λ = 0.71073 Å)

figures.description: Ball and stick representation of the asymmetric unit of ZnIm α-phase showing atom labelling scheme.
Ball and stick representation of the asymmetric unit of ZnIm β-phase showing atom labelling scheme.
Plot of Zn1-N bond lengths vs. pressure.
Plot of Zn2-N bond lengths vs. pressure.
Plot of N-Zn1-N bond angles vs. pressure.
Plot of N-Zn2-N bond angles vs. pressure.
